information: All Amounts related to price or cost are in Rands (ZAR)

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Tasting Menu at {index}
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Tasting Menu

/a-la-carte-menu./: Returns A La Carte Menu Data

/starters./: Returns the Starters subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Starters at {index}
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Starters

/mains./: Returns the Mains subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Mains at {index}
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Mains

/desserts./: Returns the Desserts subsection of the A La Carte Menu

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Desserts at {index}
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Desserts
